UData\Widgets\UIButton

Creates a UIButton element.

Information
Extends

UData\Widgets\StdBase

Options

This widgets output representation depends on the options it is given.

If given the href option this widgets representation will be in the

form an HTML anchor with the class of 'btn'. More class options can

be given as well. The absence of the href option will casue the

representation to be an HTML button element with the default type

of 'button'. This type can be overridden by giving the type option.
